body_html:
• It's a big change
  • It's a breaking change
  • It's a big performance regression
  • The benefit is that memory profiles of output are the same as input. With the caching allocator and python being refcounted, I'm not even sure this is that big of a benefit.
body_text:
It's a big change
It's a breaking change
It's a big performance regression
The benefit is that memory profiles of output are the same as input. With the caching allocator and python being refcounted, I'm not even sure this is that big of a benefit.
body:
- It's a big change
- It's a breaking change
- It's a big performance regression
- The benefit is that memory profiles of output are the same as input. With the caching allocator and python being refcounted, I'm not even sure this is that big of a benefit.
